channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IN

item.title: Report E-2024010460
item.description:
Report E-2024010460

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-30T15:10:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-22
  • City: VINCENNES
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: a pint of BPR 81156R Neutralizer released from an IBC tote due to weather when securing the totes metal frame. The release impacted the trailer floor. No Drains, Soils or Waterways were impacted.

item.title: Report X-2024010539
item.description:
Report X-2024010539

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-26T15:11:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-16
  • City: PLAINFIELD
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON ARRIVING FOUND A HAZMAT LEAKING. UPON RETURNING THE LEAKER TO THE CAGE FOR PROCESSING IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT ONE OF THE CAPS WAS COMPLETELY OFF THE CONTAINER ALONG WITH OTHER CAPS LOOSE.
